title: Are you currently pregnant or breastfeeding?

advice.Yes: Consult your healthcare provider before starting any new skincare regimen.

title: What is your skin condition like?

advice.Dry: Focus on hydrating products like hyaluronic acid or ceramides.
advice.Oily: Use lightweight, non-comedogenic moisturizers to avoid clogging pores.

title: What is your primary skincare goal?

advice.Hydration: Include hydrating serums and moisturizers in your routine.
advice.Acne treatment: Look for products containing salicylic acid or benzoyl peroxide.
advice.Anti-aging: Consider using products with retinoids or peptides.
advice.Brightening: Use vitamin C serums to help even out skin tone.

title: How often do you experience acne problems?
description: Select one option if acne issues are detected.

advice.3-4 times a month: Consider consulting a dermatologist for persistent acne.
advice.Always: Seek professional advice to identify potential underlying causes.

title: Do you have any allergies to specific ingredients?

advice.Nut oils: Avoid products containing almond, walnut, or other nut-based oils.
advice.Rosemary extract: Check ingredient lists carefully for plant-based extracts.

title: Do you have any specific skin conditions or medical issues?

advice.Eczema: Stick to products with soothing ingredients like colloidal oatmeal.
advice.Psoriasis: Use medicated creams or shampoos specifically for psoriasis.
advice.Rosacea: Avoid products with alcohol or other potential irritants.

title: How long are you exposed to sunlight daily?

advice.4-6 hours: Ensure you apply sunscreen with SPF 30 or higher daily.
advice.7-8 hours: Consider wearing hats or protective clothing in addition to sunscreen.
advice.More than 8 hours: Frequent reapplication of sunscreen is essential for long sun exposure.

title: How much water do you drink daily?

advice.Less than 1 liter: You should drink more water to keep your skin hydrated.

title: What time do you usually go to bed recently?

advice.After 3 AM: Try to sleep earlier to improve skin regeneration.

title: How often have you been feeling stressed lately?

advice.Often: Incorporate stress-relief techniques such as yoga or meditation.
advice.Very Often: Chronic stress can impact your skin; seek support or professional help.

title: Do you smoke or consume alcohol regularly?

advice.Yes: Smoking and alcohol can dehydrate the skin; consider reducing consumption.

title: Are you currently using any skincare products?
description: Please select one option. If yes, list the products you use.

advice.No: Start with basic skincare: a gentle cleanser, moisturizer, and sunscreen.

title: How often do you exfoliate your skin?

advice.Rarely/Never: Consider exfoliating once a week to remove dead skin cells.
advice.Daily: Daily exfoliation may irritate your skin; reduce to 2-3 times per week.
